metadata.titleEn: Multi-scale surface flux and meteorological elements observation dataset in the Hai River Basin(Huailai station-automatic weather station-10m tower, 2019)
metadata.titleCn: 海河流域多尺度地表通量与气象要素观测数据集：怀来站-自动气象站（10m塔）（2019）
metadata.description:
This dataset includes data obtained from the automatic weather station (AWS) at the observation system of Meteorological elements of Huailai station between January 1 and December 31, 2019. The site (115.7880° E, 40.3491° N) was located on a maize surface, which is near Donghuayuan Town of Huailai city in Hebei Province. The elevation is 480 m. The installation heights and orientations of different sensors and measured quantities were as follows: air temperature and humidity profile (5 m, north), wind speed and direction profile (10 m, north), air pressure (in the box), rain gauge (10 m), four-component radiometer (5 m, south), two infrared temperature sensors (5 m, south, vertically downward), soil heat flux (-0.06 m), soil temperature profile (0, -0.02, -0.04, -0.1, -0.2, -0.4, -0.8, -1.2, and -1.6 m), soil moisture profile (-0.02, -0.04, -0.1, -0.2, -0.4, -0.8, -1.2, and -1.6 m), and a TCAV averaging soil thermocouple probe (-0.02, -0.04 m).
The observations included the following: air temperature and humidity (Ta_5 m; RH_5 m) (℃ and %, respectively), wind speed (Ws_10 m) (m/s), wind direction (WD_10 m) (°), air pressure (press) (hpa), precipitation (rain) (mm), four-component radiation (DR, incoming shortwave radiation; UR, outgoing shortwave radiation; DLR_Cor, incoming longwave radiation; ULR_Cor, outgoing longwave radiation; Rn, net radiation) (W/m2), infrared temperature (IRT_1 and IRT_2) (℃), soil heat flux (Gs_1, Gs_2 and Gs_3) (W/m2), soil temperature (Ts_0 cm, Ts_2 cm, Ts_4 cm, Ts_10 cm, Ts_20 cm, Ts_40 cm, Ts_80 cm, Ts_120 cm, and Ts_160 cm) (℃), soil moisture (Ms_2 cm, Ms_4 cm, Ms_10 cm, Ms_20 cm, Ms_40 cm, Ms_80 cm, Ms_120 cm, and Ms_160 cm) (%, volumetric water content), and average soil temperature (TCAV, ℃).
The data processing and quality control steps were as follows: (1) The AWS data were averaged over intervals of 10 min for a total of 144 records per day. The missing data were denoted by -6999. (2) Data in duplicate records were rejected. (3) Unphysical data were rejected. (4) The data marked in red are problematic data. (5) The format of the date and time was unified, and the date and time were collected in the same column, for example, date and time: 2018-6-10 10:30. (6) Finally, the naming convention was AWS+ site no. Moreover, suspicious data were marked in red.
For more information, please refer to Guo et al. (2020) (for sites information), Liu et al. (2013) (for data processing) in the Citation section.
metadata.descriptionCn:
数据集包含了2019年1月1日至2019年12月31日的10m塔自动气象站观测数据。站点位于河北省怀来县东花园镇，下垫面为水浇地玉米。观测点的经纬度是115.7880E, 40.3491N，海拔480m。
自动气象站安装在10m塔上，采集频率为30s，且10min输出一次。观测要素包括空气温度、相对湿度（5 m），朝向为正北；风速（10 m），风向（10 m），朝向为正北；气压（安装在防水箱内）；雨量（10 m）；四分量辐射（5 m），朝向为正南；土壤温湿度探头埋设在气象塔正南方1.5m处，土壤温度探头埋设深度为0cm、2cm、4cm、10cm、20cm、40cm、80cm、120cm和160 cm处，土壤水分传感器埋设深度为2cm、4cm、10cm、20cm、40cm、80cm、120cm和160cm；平均土壤温度埋在地下2, 4cm；土壤热流板（3块）埋设在地下6 cm处。
观测数据的处理与质量控制：（1）确保每天1440个数据（每10min），若出现数据的缺失，则由-6999标示；（2）剔除有重复记录的时刻；（3）删除了明显超出物理意义或超出仪器量程的数据；（4）日期和时间的格式统一，并且日期、时间在同一列。如，时间为：2019-6-10 10:30。8月5-8月21日间由于供电问题，数据缺失。
    自动气象站发布的数据包括：日期/时间Date/Time，空气温湿观测（Ta_5m,RH_5m）(℃，%)，风速(Ws_10m)（m/s），风向（WD）（°），气压（Press）(hpa)，降水（Rain）(mm)，四分量辐射（DR、UR、DLR、ULR、Rn）(W/m2)，土壤热通量（Gs_1、Gs_2、Gs_3）(W/m2)、 多层土壤水分（Ms_2cm、Ms_4cm、Ms_10cm、Ms_20cm、Ms_40cm、Ms_80cm、Ms_120cm、Ms_160cm）(%)、多层土壤温度（Ts_2cm 、Ts_4cm、Ts_10cm、Ts_20cm、Ts_40cm、Ts_80cm、Ts_120cm、Ts_160cm）(℃)、平均土壤温度TCAV(℃)。
观测试验或站点信息请参考Guo et al. (2020)，数据处理请参考Liu et al. (2013)。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What characteristics define the meteorological and soil data collection methods in a dataset focused on surface fluxes and meteorological factors in a river basin?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在一个关注河流流域表面通量和气象因素的数据集中，气象和土壤数据收集方法的特征包括：
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: automatic weather station, 10m tower, data collection frequency of 30 seconds, output every 10 minutes, air temperature at 5m, relative humidity at 5m, wind speed at 10m, wind direction at 10m, atmospheric pressure, precipitation, four-component radiation, soil temperature at various depths, soil moisture at various depths, soil heat flux, average soil temperature, daily data checks, removal of duplicates, filtering out physically implausible values, missing data marked with a specific placeholder
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 自动气象站，10米塔，数据采集频率为30秒，每10分钟输出一次，5米处的空气温度，5米处的相对湿度，10米处的风速，10米处的风向，大气压力，降水，四分量辐射，不同深度的土壤温度，不同深度的土壤湿度，土壤热通量，平均土壤温度，每日数据检查，去除重复数据，过滤掉物理上不合理的值，缺失数据用特定占位符标记。

Quantification.QuestionCn: 在海河流域观测数据集中，10米塔的自动气象站每天收集多少个数据点？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the purpose of using an automatic weather station in the context of meteorological and surface flux observations?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在气象和表面通量观测的背景下，使用自动气象站的目的是为了实时收集和监测气象数据，包括温度、湿度、风速、降水量等，以便进行气象分析、预报和研究。
Definition.AnswerEn: An automatic weather station is used in meteorological and surface flux observations to continuously collect data such as air temperature, relative humidity, wind speed and direction, atmospheric pressure, precipitation, radiation components, soil heat flux, and soil moisture and temperature at various depths. This allows for high-frequency, consistent, and accurate data collection essential for understanding environmental and climatic conditions.
Definition.AnswerCn: 自动气象站用于气象和表面通量观测，持续收集空气温度、相对湿度、风速和风向、大气压力、降水、辐射成分、土壤热通量以及不同深度的土壤湿度和温度等数据。这使得高频率、一致性和准确的数据收集成为可能，对于理解环境和气候条件至关重要。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What outcomes can be expected from using automated weather station data collected at a high frequency over a year in agricultural areas regarding climate monitoring and agricultural planning?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用在农业地区以高频率收集的自动气象站数据进行气候监测和农业规划，可以预期以下结果：
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using automated weather station data collected at a high frequency over a year in agricultural areas can lead to enhanced climate monitoring and agricultural planning. The data can provide detailed insights into local climate patterns, including temperature, humidity, wind speed, and soil moisture levels, which are crucial for understanding crop growth conditions. This can improve the accuracy of weather predictions, inform irrigation strategies, and optimize planting schedules to enhance crop yield and resource efficiency. Additionally, continuous monitoring helps detect and respond to extreme weather events, potentially reducing agricultural losses.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用在农业地区以高频率收集的自动气象站数据，可以增强气候监测和农业规划。这些数据可以提供对当地气候模式的详细洞察，包括温度、湿度、风速和土壤湿度水平，这些对于理解作物生长条件至关重要。这可以提高天气预测的准确性，指导灌溉策略，并优化种植时间表，以提高作物产量和资源效率。此外，持续监测有助于检测和应对极端天气事件，可能减少农业损失。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the primary goals of collecting multi-scale surface flux and meteorological data using automated weather stations in agricultural regions?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在农业地区使用自动气象站收集多尺度表面通量和气象数据的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary goals include understanding the interactions between surface fluxes and meteorological elements in agricultural regions, providing high-frequency data to analyze atmospheric conditions, improving agricultural management practices by monitoring weather conditions, and supporting research on climate and environmental changes by offering detailed and quality-controlled datasets. The data can be used to study air temperature, humidity, wind speed and direction, pressure, precipitation, radiation components, and soil temperature and moisture, which are crucial for understanding environmental dynamics and enhancing predictive models.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标包括理解农业地区表面通量与气象要素之间的相互作用，提供高频数据以分析大气条件，通过监测天气条件改善农业管理实践，并通过提供详细且经过质量控制的数据集支持气候和环境变化的研究。这些数据可用于研究空气温度、湿度、风速和风向、气压、降水、辐射成分以及土壤温度和湿度，这些对于理解环境动态和增强预测模型至关重要。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural methods are employed to ensure the accuracy and reliability of meteorological data collected from automatic weather stations in agricultural environments?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在农业环境中，为确保从自动气象站收集的气象数据的准确性和可靠性，采用了哪些程序方法？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The procedural methods include ensuring that data is collected every 10 minutes with a frequency of 30 seconds and marking any missing data with -6999. Duplicate records are removed, and any data exceeding physical or instrument limits are deleted. Date and time are standardized into a single column. Additionally, due to power supply issues, data from August 5-21 is missing.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 程序方法包括确保每10分钟收集一次数据，频率为30秒，并用-6999标记任何缺失的数据。删除重复记录，删除任何超过物理或仪器限制的数据。日期和时间标准化为一个单独的列。此外，由于电源供应问题，8月5日至21日的数据缺失。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What data quality control methods are employed to ensure the reliability of meteorological station data in the field of surface flux and meteorological element observation?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 在表面通量和气象元素观测领域，为确保气象站数据的可靠性，采用了哪些数据质量控制方法？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The data quality control methods employed include ensuring that there are 1440 data entries per day (every 10 minutes), marking missing data with -6999, removing records with duplicate timestamps, deleting data that is physically implausible or beyond instrument range, and standardizing date and time formats.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 所采用的数据质量控制方法包括确保每天有1440个数据条目（每10分钟一次），用-6999标记缺失数据，删除具有重复时间戳的记录，删除物理上不合理或超出仪器范围的数据，以及标准化日期和时间格式。
